nodes.text: A Krodyur was a flat creature, sporting a white fur and a dreadful jaw. Extremely dangerous and hard to see in the mountain of Shingra—especially during the night—it would often attack the voyagers.
The Krodyur was created by Jean Balczesak for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario L'écume de l'espace which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 44.
